content:
10    攻擊時以2%的機率2秒內讓敵人陷入眩暈狀態。
(若敵人高於Lv42，則減少進入異常狀態的機率；反之，則增加機率。決鬥場修正為1秒)


[if]

[cooltime]
4000    
[attack success]
1    

[/if]

[then]

[target]
`enemy`
-1    
[reduce duration to human armor at pvp module]
50    
[duration]
2000    
[reduce probability to human armor at pvp module]
80    
[probability]
2    
[active status]
`stun`
24    
[/then]
